text: Ani jyanni imana rakhale ani satkarma karita rahile, amhi lavakaraca tyanna jannatacya bagammadhye dakhala karu, jyancya khali nahari (pravaha) vahata aheta, jyata te nehami rahatila. Tithe tyancyasathi pavitryapurna, silavana patn'ya asatila ani amhi tyanna data savalita (aramasira jagi) thevu
